comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:57.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/57.0
Build ID: 20171115095126

Steps to reproduce:

Browsing for a while, no particular site or application where it happens. Affects firefox itself as well.




Actual results:

After browsing for a while, the menus on sites (dropdowns) no longer function. Any dropdown when clicked does not respond. Even the menu of firefox (on the far right, hamburger) does not work anymore.

Interestingly, spam clicking the firefox menu does show it for a fraction of a second.

Running Firefox restore did not work. Opening and closing firefox completely sometimes works but not reliable.

Menus to just function properly, as well as dropdowns.

Build ID: 20171115095126

Steps to reproduce:

Browsing for a while, no particular site or application where it happens. Affects firefox itself as well.




Actual results:

After browsing for a while, the menus on sites (dropdowns) no longer function. Any dropdown when clicked does not respond. Even the menu of firefox (on the far right, hamburger) does not work anymore.

Interestingly, spam clicking the firefox menu does show it for a fraction of a second.

Running Firefox restore did not work. Opening and closing firefox completely sometimes works but not reliable.
